item.description:
IN LIGHT OF THE FACT THAT THIS IS OUR FIRST MEETUP UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT I HAVE DECIDED TO FOREGO ANY FEE, TO ALLOW MEMBERS TO DETERMINE IF THIS IS GOING TO BE WORTH THEIR TIME AND ATTENDANCE.

Our next meetup is on Feb. 17th,Wed. at 7 p.m. Will hold a raffle for a software program called "Detail 2" by Topaz Labs, it is a Photoshop Plug-in, in addition to several other items for the photographer.

We will be demonstrating the new software for your camera to remote control and view live on your Iphone your photos as you shoot them. In addition to methods to enhance and bring out the best results in your photography, be it portrait, or landscape. One person (maybe 2 if there's time) in attendance will have an opportunity for a free portrait in this session, so you might want to dress up for the possibility. DO NOT wear anything green, and solid colors are preferred.

I will be fun and hopefully knowledge based and entertaining meetup. Hope to see you all there.

Refreshments are served.
item.name: NO FEE! New England Photography Network February Meetup NO CHARGE!
